Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ PES2016 Settings can be opened within Wrapper (Show package contents); then you can set the right resolution for your screen and other things...

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ PS3 & PS4 controllers you need to pair the controller to your mac and open the game settings:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ It seems that the performance is not very good (stuttering) so be sure to set the Settings right with resolution and graphic quality before play; If you have still problems  you could try to deactivate the CSMT feature of the wineskin's engine...
